judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Beien, Kobeets and Pomeboy, JJ.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree vacated for the reasons noted in Righter v. Righter, 442 Pa. 428, 275 A. 2d 4 (1971), announced this same date. Each party to pay own costs. The matter is transferred to the Orphans’ Court Division of the Court , of Common Pleas of Philadelphia.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Malcolm, W. Berko wits, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Thomas, Appellant, v. Thomas.
Submitted November 19, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Beien, Kobeets and Pomeboy, JJ.
Malcolm, W. Berko wits, for appellant.
Arnold H. Winicov, for appellee.
March 18, 1971:
